articles.title: Slovakia election: Anti-Ukraine populist Fico faces ex-journalist Simecka - The Washington Post
articles.description: A coalition headed by former prime minister Robert Fico could hurt Europe’s unity on Ukraine.

articles.title: 2023 Ryder Cup schedule: U.S., Europe teams set matchups, pairings, tee times for Day 2 on Saturday - CBS Sports
